name: Minimal Code Radio
description: This userstyle strips out all extraneous elements and leaves just the bare minimum. Works great if used without user chrome via Chrome's "Create Shortcut" option.
additional_info:
Please let me know if anything is broken and I'll try to fix it just as quick as I can.

Note: The player itself is embedded via an iframe, the URL is https://coderadio-admin.freecodecamp.org/public/coderadio/embed. if you don't mind missing the 'xx coders listening right now' bit you could  just load the player directly without having to use this UserStyle.

I also found an alternative Code Radio interface with song history and playlist download at https://coderadio-admin.freecodecamp.org/public/coderadio.

Hope this helps!
